title: Aditya-L1: Why 2026 will be a year like no other for India’s Sun mission
description: For the first time Aditya-L1 will be able to watch the Sun in its maximum activity cycle.
content:
For Aditya-L1, India's first solar observation mission in space, the year 2026 is expected to be like no other.
It's the first time the observatory – which was placed in orbit last year - will be able to watch the Sun when it reaches its maximum acti... [5193 chars]

title: WW1 toxic compound sprayed on Georgian protesters, BBC evidence suggests
description: Anti-government demonstrators are likely to have been targeted with camite, our investigation finds.
content:
Georgia's authorities used a World War One-era chemical weapon to quell anti-government protesters last year, evidence gathered by the BBC suggests.
"You could feel [the water] burning," one of the protesters said of water cannon turned on him and ot... [9842 chars]

title: Trump confirms he recently spoke with Venezuela’s Nicolás Maduro
description: Trump remained tight-lipped on details of call with Venezuelan president as tensions rise between countries
content:
Donald Trump confirmed on Sunday that he had spoken with Venezuelan president Nicolás Maduro, but he did not provide details on what the two leaders discussed.
“I don’t want to comment on it. The answer is yes,” the US president said when asked if he... [2367 chars]

title: Special forces chief tried to cover up concerns about SAS conduct in Afghanistan, inquiry told
description: Whistleblower says chain of command failed to stop extrajudicial shootings, including of children, after alarm was raised
content:
The former director of UK special forces and other senior military officers tried to cover up concerns that SAS units were carrying out unlawful killings in Afghanistan, an inquiry has heard.
A senior special forces whistleblower said the chain of co... [5576 chars]

title: Paddington: The Musical review - they’ve looked after this bear quite splendiferously
description: State-of-the-art animatronics, imaginative staging, fabulous performances and some marvellous songs about marmalade make for an evening that will fill you with joy and melt your heart
content: Here is the Peruvian bear as we have never seen him before – or so we are led to believe from the marketing of this musical, which is based on the beloved 2014 film, based on Michael Bond’s beloved books. But this is in fact exactly how we have seen ... [3752 chars]
